Somos una pareja Argentino / Venezolano viviendo en Barcelona por muchos años, flexi veganos, optimistas, sociables, mente abierta, respetuosos y atentos, siempre nos ha gustado compartir y conocer personas de otras culturas, hacemos practica budista, yoga, vamos al gym, nos interesa la espiritualidad, la comida sana, experiencias,etc...  Nuestra gran afición es viajar, hemos estado en Londres, Berlin, Istambul, París, Roma, Amsterdam, Portugal, Bruselas, entre otros destinos... Nos gustan las series y películas independiente, nos encanta salir a cenar fuera y podemos recomendar varios restaurantes en Barcelona. Nos gusta todo tipo de música, desde jazz a electrónica de vanguardia, A veces salimos de fiesta en clubs. Ademas nos encanta la playa y vivir el presente. Carpe Diem!

 Aquí les esperamos en nuestro piso para atenderlos y guiarlos de la mejor manera en su estadía por Barcelona, son bienvenidos!!

HOLA SOM JUAN RAMON Y KHADY, DE BARCELONA Y SENEGAL, NOS GUSTA CONOCER GENTE NUEVA Y VER QUE SE SIENTEN EN NUESTRA CASA COMODOS Y BIEN ACOGIDOS, ESPERAMOS ENCONTRARNOS PRONTO Y VER COMO DISFRUTAIS DE VUESTRAS VACACIONES EN BARCELONA...HASTA PRONTO!!!

Somos una pareja limpia, ordenada, simpática y educada.
Nos encanta hacer sentir a la gente que están como en casa y por eso recomendamos los mejores sitios calidad precio!

Nos gustan las personas, trabajar con ellas y el trabajo en equipo.  Nos gusta conocer gente de otros lugares y viajar a nuevos destinos. Nos gusta compartir una buena mesa llena de amigos, de  charlar interminables , y brindar con una copa de vino. Nos gusta descubrir pequeños rincones y nuevos caminos. Nos gusta el deporte, la escalada,  la montaña, la playa, estirarnos al sol y sentir la brisa . Nos gusta la cultura, la historia, el teatro, la ópera , el cine y las tardes de relax acompañadas de un buen libro.

Hola! We are Ulpio and Vic, an italian couple who live in Barcelona for three years. We are an architect and a pastry chef. Our passions range from design to photography and every kind of art, including food art. 
We love welcoming people and sharing our life experiences and interests with them. 
Every moment is good to have a coffee and meet friends.  
Let's have one together?
Soy Hostelero.

Soy un chico de 31 años de Cordoba,Andalucía que resido en Barcelona por motivos de trabajo y familia.
Soy una persona activa, trabajadora,deportista,simpática.
Me gusta conocer gente de otros países.

I am a visiting professor at the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona. I love to travel and discover the world and its people, I like photography and playing music. I am a respectful guest, but I am open to meet people all the time. I like all ways of travelling, from biking several hours per day and backpacking, to attending work-related meetings with a suitcase. 

"There's a big, a big hard sun
Beating on the big people
In the big hard world" E.V.

Soy una persona alegre, servicial, amante de los animales. Me gusta la decoración y conocer personas de diferentes entornos culturales y nacionalidades. He vivido en varios países y he sido voluntario de la Cruz Roja Portuguesa.

Amantes de la naturaleza, bailar y los animales (vivimos con una perra) . Los deportes, el mar, el buen comer y la buena música. 

Nos encanta viajar y cocinar, la cerveza artesana,...

I'm a dancer and yoga and pilates teacher. I'm quite and easy going. I don't smoke and there is no pets in home.
I like music more than TV or books.

My home is my place of the world for get peace and calm.

Hola soy una persona tranquila amo la vida y me gusta la gente de todo el mundo 
Hi. I  am Jaan.  I am a very quiet person  and love people all over the world

My children are my reason for living, I love them. I like my city and my country. My children live a week with me and a week with their mother. I rent their rooms when they are not at home, this help me to pay the rent of our apartment. So, the room is in the apartment where I live.

I am discreet, respectful, clean and tidy. Easy going! I love meditation and reading. My passion is singing. I am a Reiki practitioner, meditation, healing by sacred songs, prayers flames, journey of the soul.
I love hiking, I enjoy spending time in nature and the outdoors.
I also love animals, although in my accommodation no pets.
I think that people should not separate our intellectual or social level, but united by our heart.
I love to host people traveling: I have the opportunity to meet wonderful and interesting people ... and also usually you're happy people and you come always in a good mood!
Live and let live!
***************
Soy una persona discreta, respetuosa, limpia y ordenada. Adoro la meditación y la lectura. Mi pasión es cantar. Soy practicante de Reiki, meditación, sanación a través del canto sagrado, oraciones de Las Llamas, Viaje del Alma.
He practicado excursionismo, me gusta pasar tiempo en la naturaleza y al aire libre.
También amo a los animales, aunque en mi alojamiento no hay mascotas.
Opino que las personas no debemos separarnos por nuestro nivel intelectual o social, sino unirnos por nuestro corazón.
Me encanta hospedar a gente viajera: me ofrece la oportunidad de conocer a personas maravillosas e interesantes... y además suele ser gente feliz y siempre venís de muy buen humor!
Vive y deja vivir!!
alegre y muy servicial

Happy Houses Barcelona is a local holiday rental agency offering accommodations in the Barcelona and Sitges region. We are determined to give you a comfortable stay and will offer you good communication, fair prices and a personal check in. We look forward to welcoming you.
We are an ordinary family who are always glad to see the guests!
I <3 Travelling

Hola soy Marcelo, me encuentro residiendo en Barcelona hace un tiempo, con mi esposa Alicia y mascota Tiziana. Soy una persona muy cordial, amable y me gusta la pizza!! Me encanta viajar, lo siento no leo mucho pero disfruto de la buena música.

Como huéspedes y anfitriones encontraras en mi y en mi familia personas divertidas y llenas de vida. Nos encantaría que pasaras un tiempo por nuestro hogar.
I am from Germany and I love travelling... :-)
host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about: I'm Estefany, I'm 26 years old, I am an interior designer and art lover.
我就是我啊 不一样的烟火
host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about: Soy una persona sencilla, muy solidaria, sin complicaciones, dispuesta ayudar cuando sea necesario, soy organizada, limpia ,responsable y me encanta conocer a personas de diferentes culturas.
Easy going, polite, friendly and neat.
I am a sociable, easy-going and respectful person who I've been abroad for a while and I like to discover new places and people :)
Hombre maduro,de naturaleza amable y tranquilo.

Hello! I am Melissa. Traveling is my passion, I love to see and understand the world from every point of view. Colors, nature and animals attract me. Discovering the world is my therapy, I am a big fan of history and traveling takes us to the past, present and future.

Mi familia y yo, os ofrecemos compartir nuestra casa para que puedas disfrutar de nuestra querida ciudad Barcelona.

Cuando viajas  se que tener a alguien que pueda orientarte o ayudar en la planificación para tener una estancia mejor es de agradecer.

Os esperamos.
host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about: Friendly and easy going man from Barcelona-Spain who loves traveling and share time meeting people all over the world !

Hola ! Les cuento un poco de mi : me gusta la danza, conectada a la emoción , y me encanta viajar ,es lo que me hace sentirme vivo ,me encanto Guatemala, Belice y Mexico .Chile tambien y Argentina claro que es de donde vengo .
No podria vivir sin meditar cada dia ,y aunque no sea unos minutos de yoga .
Me gusta tanto el Drum(paquiestani) como el pastel de papa de mi madre,igualmente como de todo y me encantan las tapas españolas.como los tacos mexicanos.
Mis libros : el expectro de la conciencia ,Ken Wilber . Arquetipos Carl G. Jung ; y la danza de la realidad , Psicomagia y Metagenealogia de Jodorosky.

Hello, this is my house for 20 years. I am university professor and between travels of pleasure and work (lectures mainly) I have visited almost all the countries of America, Western Europe, Japan, Philippines, Morocco ...

I like people, and I consider that meeting people from different cultures and countries has been one of the most enriching things of my life.

I am host and guest of airbnb and I like to establish personal relationships with my hosts and guests.
Professional of the travel industry, speaking French (Native) English, and Spanish. I will be happy to assist you during your booking and answer all of the questions you may have.

Soy una persona positiva por naturaleza. 
Me encanta aprender de la vida y el contacto con las personas.
La verdad es que estoy disfrutando muchísimo de la experiencia como anfitriona en Airbnb.  Me está permitiendo conocer a personas maravillosas y a través de ellas, sus historias y países. Es realmente como viajar por todo el mundo sin salir de casa.
Lo más bonito es el vínculo que creo con algunos de mis huéspedes y sentir que lo que doy y recibo va mucho más allá de una simple transacción económica.
Gracias!

Persona sencilla, ordenada y con ganas de conocer gente nueva y amigable! Comprometido con la hospitalidad, me gusta ayudar a los demás y que se sientan como en casa.
Soy graduado en administración de empresas.

We are specialised in rental apartments in Barcelona for temporary and mid term visitors of the city. Since our founding in 1999 we received over 20.000 guests.

We aim to offer our customers a comfortable stay, which is reflected not only in stylish apartments but also in a quick and personal service.

Barcelona has after all those years, nestled in our hearts and we hope it will affect you in a similar way.

At the reception you will meet me, Beata or Virginia, my fellow colleagues who will be more than pleased to help you with all your requests!

Somos personas amables y respetuosas. Nos gusta recibir  viajeros y enseñarles aspectos de Barcelona.
Así como brindar información y ayuda en todo lo que necesiten.
Nuestro objetivo es proporcionar todo lo necesario para brindar un trato acojedor y cercano.
host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about: enjoy and respect

Éditrice et passionnée de littérature, je n'aime rien de plus que de découvrir de nouveaux livres lors de mes voyages. Je m'assure donc toujours de laisser à disposition de mes visiteurs les livres et les revues qui m’ont fait le plus rêver et/ou réfléchir au cours des derniers mois. 
Adepte de cuisine végétarienne et de bons vins, je laisse également à disposition de mes visiteurs les meilleurs guides pour s’y retrouver à Barcelone.

Travel is a passion, the world is a book.

I like respecting other peoples places and I strongly believe that we all get what we deserve, so I try my best to treat people the nicest way I can. Though  I can get a little grumpy at times, for that there are only few solutions: food and coffee and a well deserved nap :)

I am a workaholic but more and more I am trying to combine travel and job. Having great time and trying to live at my fullest.
host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about:
Soy Marta Bosch, hija del propietario ,tambien vivo en la casa. Estudie turismo y me encanta conocer gente de todas las partes del mundo. Soy una pesrona hospitalaria y buena conocedora de la ciudad de Barcelona. Mi principal intencion es que se sientan como en casa
I am Marta Bosch, daughter of the owner and also I live in the house. I study tourism and I love meeting people from all over the world. I am a hospital staff and a good knower of the city of Barcelona. My main intention is to make you feel at home.

31 años, argentino, lector de poesía, escritor de noche, amante de la bicicleta, respetuoso e inquieto. 

Trabajo con la madera, soy apasionado de los objetos, del diseño, de la decoración.

Creo en el buen humor, en la confianza, en la posibilidad de seguir aprendiendo.

Espero recibir huéspedes de buen corazón.

Hello! 

My name is Ramón and I'm from Barcelona, Spain. Currently I'm studying and working in aviation sector.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.

It will be my pleasure to have you as my guest :)

I've been travelling for many years and liked pretty much to meet new culture,discover new ways of seeing people and life in general.
My favorite country is usa,the best city NY..
I love reading and dancing and enjoy pretty much skating on the beach.
This is my favorite quotes:
"I am nothing.
I shall never be anything.
I cannot wish to be anything. Aside from that, I hold within me
all the dreams of the world" (Pessoa).

Come to visit Barcelona (website hidden);s a great city!!! :)
I am a professional working in the customer service industry. I love to travel the world and meet new people.

¡Hola a todos! 

Somos una pareja viviendo en Barcelona desde hace años y nos encanta la idea de poder compartir con gente nueva esta cuidad tan increíble.
Uno es de Perú y otro de Francia, hablamos francés, catalán, español, ingles y ruso.
Nos gusta descubrir ideas nuevas y personas con quien conversar, que sea de comida o de viajes mejor aun! jajajaja
No somos exigentes como anfitriones sino lo habitual: Dejar la casa como la habéis encontrado. 
Hay un dicho de bienvenida que particularmente habla por si-mismo:
"Ven tal como eres, la sonrisa es la forma universal de decir ¡Bienvenido!"

Bienvenidos a nuestra casa y hogar, ¡les esperemos!
Un saludo grande

I'm from Barcelona, I'm Geographer. I love travelling, sports, especially football, cars and videogames.

Fascinated with New York and Thailand. Last visited destination: Cornwall.
I support Espanyol (football team in Barcelona)
Love pizza, pasta, cheese nachos, pa amb tomàquet and patatas bravas (spanish tapas).
Curioso y aventurero. Prefiero vivir las ciudades desde dentro. Soy más bien tranquilo, ordenado y me gustan los espacios limpios.
Sociable y buen rollo

Soy muy sociable y comunicativa y me gusta compartir experiencias, vivencias y charlas con otras personas. Me gusta el cine, la música y leer. Me encanta viajar y conocer nuevas culturas. Soy amante de la buena gastronomía. En casa vivo sola.
I'm very outgoing and communicative, and I'like to share experiencies and talks with other people. I like cinema, music and reading. I love travelling and meeting other cultures. I'm lover of good gastronomy. I live alone at home.
We are a young couple. We study and work. We like meeting people from different countries.

My profession is graphic designer but right now I am exclusively dedicated to my baby twins and to hosting my guest.

I like art & design. I love going to the beach and I hate cold weather. My lovely boy is brazilian.

Vivo en Barcelona desde hace tres años, trabajo como funcionario, soy una persona activa, me gusta mucho disfrutar de los eventos y del entorno de la ciudad; en casa vivo solo y hago vida prácticamente 100% en mi habitación, me gusta descansar y leer o enredar con la tablet, como y ceno siempre fuera de casa, así que no cocino.

Hola queridos amigos , 
por fin,  con mi Aaron hemos decidido volver a nuestra pasión mas grande:  
viajar !pero , esta vez, Nuestros viajes serán mas rápidos y mas cercano.
La experiencia que Vosotros  habéis regalado a nuestra casa ha sido maravillosa, así que hemos decidido continuar con acoger  amigos de todos el  mundo en nuestro lindo hogar el corazón de Barcelona.
Con la ayuda de FEDERICO  nuestro cohost , y nuestro amigo, empezamos esta nueva experiencia, intentando ofrecerles un servicio amable y de calidad a la altura de nuestra fama como anfitriones. 
Una cosa esta clarísima..cada uno de vosotros sera cuidado como antes , y por cualquier cosa , tanto yo, como Aaron estaremos siempre cerca de Vosotros ,  en la web privada de airbnb como  por (Hidden by Airbnb) . 
Feliz vida amigos
Em dic Santiago, sóc de Barcelona i tinc 26 anys. Em considero un noi sociable, respetuos y amb ganes de veure món. Per aixo mateix, crec que una bona forma es utilitzant aquest tipus de apps.
Soy una chica tranquila, me gusta el arte la música, viajar y conocer gente.
Metsätonttu Suomesta

We are a young couple; my wife is Carol and i'm Lorena, and we live with our two kitties Luna and Lola. We are both artists (she is an makeup artist and i'm graphic designer) We are very passionated about life and we love to meet new people. We have two well behaved kitties, Luna and Lola. We enjoy a lot our home because it's a beautiful space, warm and cozy with a lot of positive energy and we want to share this good feeling with other people. People who comes to enjoy the city and have a good talk are welcome!
Somos Odón y Sylvia, nos hemos esforzado para dejar nuestro hogar lo más acogedor posible para recibir a nuestros huéspedes como se merecen.

Soy madre de 2 niñas de 10 y 13 años. Somos una familia muy inquieta que nos encanta la actividad al aire libre (bici, caminar, montañismo etc).
Cuando podemos nos gusta viajar y conocer otros paise y culturas, aunque a veces no es facil encontrar el tiempo y el dinero para hacerlo. Cuando viajamos nos encanta el trato con la gente autóctona así que intentamos siempre organizar nuestros viajes pensando en poder tener contacto de una manera u otra con la gente del país, es la mejor manera de aprender lo realmente genuino de cada parte. Por este motivo pensamos que podemos dar un buen servicio a nuestros huéspedes haciendo lo que nosotros buscamos cuando viajamos (consejos de utilidad, resolución de dudas, orientación del viaje, etc). A menudo nos alojamos en apartamentos como el nuestro y gracias a esto hemos tenido experiencias muy bonitas.

Viajera por pasión . Me encanta descubrir nuevos lugares y vivir como si fuera una más del sitio. No busco turismo masivo ni super comforts ni nada de lo que puedo disfrutar ya estando donde estoy. Viajo para conocer lugares, personas y culturas.

Somos una pareja , trabajamos , viajamos , nos divertimos .
Jóvenes y felices .
Somos una pareja joven, con ganas de viajar y conocer gente de cualquier país y de intercambiar culturas y experiencias.
Love to enjoy the small things in life :D

enamorada de Europa y en especial de Barcelona. Encantada de mostrarle a todos esta hermosa cuidad llena de cultura y vida, donde se puede disfrutar desde playas hasta vida nocturna, teatros ect... Es un lugar mágico al que definitivamente siempre querrás volver.

Hi, 

I'am traveler. I don't smoke, i am very responsable, sociable and tidy.

I'm Lina
And I'll very happy to see you in my home
I'm a social person that likes to travel and learn new things.

Je suis Sophia 38 ans, d'origine Parisienne, je vis à Barcelone depuis 2003.
Je vous accueillerai personnellement à l'appartement pour la remise des clés .
Vous passerez un agréable séjour dans mon appartement .

Soy una chica de 31 años tranquila y simpática. Me dedico al mundo del arte y trabajo tanto fuera como dentro de casa. 
Llevo años compartiendo piso y me encanta intercambiar experiencias, a la vez que tener tranquilidad y espacio privado.
Soy respetuosa con la gente y también me gusta que lo sean conmigo.
Adoro a los animales y en especial a mis 2 gatos.

Hola !
Vivo en Barcelona, en esta ciudad llena de encanto y rincones donde puedes encontrarte con experiencias únicas. Es un destino único para cualquier evento familiar o profesional. En Vale Apartments nos encanta recibir a gente como tu y hacer de tu estancia algo único. Déjanos ayudarte, desde el principio de tu estancia hasta el fin, para que todo sea de tu agrado. Nos encanta hacerlo !
Conocemos bien nuestra ciudad porque la amamos y nuestra meta es el hacer que tu sientas lo mismo! Desde un paseo en Barca, hasta una cena en un pequeño gran restaurante, un paseo por las nubes en helicóptero, o una excursión en velero por el mar mediterráneo para ver la ciudad desde otra perspectiva bordeando sus playas ! Dinos lo que te gustaría hacer y haremos que sea inolvidable.
I live in Barcelona, a city full of energy that captivates you from the beginning . This city is the destination for the experience of your life. In Vale Apartments Barcelona we like to make our guests feel they are the most important people by listening and advising from the moment we meet.
The team at Vale Apartment Barcelona knows this city by heart and Hospitality is our passion, that is why we will be always on hand to help you. Any suggestion we can offer you.... Sun, beaches, art, bars, music, modern art, night life, romantic sunsets on a beach club or bar on the warm sand,  all available and waiting for your new adventure in Barcelona.

We are a family of three, Myself (English) my partner and her daughter, university age. We are liberal minded and flexible to any need you may have whilst staying in our home. We have traveled and lived in many countries over the years and welcome you to our home in one of the most vibrant cities in Europe.
I LIKE TRAVEL,LISTEN MUSIC,I LIKE COOKING,I M FRIENDLY AND HONEST AND OPEN TO MEET NEW PEOPLE. I CAN SPEAK SPANISH ,CZECH ,SLOVAK , A BIT OF RUSIAN
Barcelona lover and mother of Aila. Love to travel, a good glass of Priorat wine and    share happy moments with the people I love.

Soy un chico respetuoso, detallista y amable. Me apasiona el arte y la creatividad.
Soy tímido al principio pero luego soy muy divertido con la gente. Hablo inglés, español y catalán ¡Ven a conocerme!

Someone who thinks positively,I would describe myself as someone who is honest, caring, hardworking, and ambitious. I have a great sense of humour. I am an easy going person & don’t get easily disturbed by up/ down’s in my life. I also enjoy travelling, watching movies, going out for dinner, and having great intellectual conversations!

Location of my guest accommodation is just a 2-minute walk from Gaudi’s iconic Sagrada Familia basilica, it is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district. It offers free Wi-Fi, free coffee and hot drinks, and is 300 m from Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

We offers simple and comfortable accommodation with private room and each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

The property offers free luggage storage, as well as free tourist information, maps and discounts.

The house is situated in a quiet area, ideal if you want to be out of the city centre, but have the city’s famous landmarks within easy reach.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is just an 5-minute walk away, while the city centre can be reached by metro in 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia station. 

Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and shopping.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews
Maman Française installée à Barcelone. Par choix et amour de cette ville. Soucieuse des détails. Aime accueillir et partager.
Friendly open person, flight attendant in barcelona, easy going and willing to help and answer any questions about the city.

Soy Fernando, 42 años, he visitado más de 100 países de los cinco continentes, me considero una persona positiva, educada, respetuosa, ordenada y silenciosa. Me gusta compartir experiencias con gente de todo el mundo, me encantan los animales pero no tengo perro o gato. Me gusta en fengshui, el zen y el minimalismo.

Soy Mónica me encanta compartir con la gente conocer diferentes culturas y a la vez poder colaborar en lo que este a mi alcance.
Soy una persona amable con mucha educación y respetuosa.
Una viajera enamorada de Barcelona. Conoci esta ciudad y no pude salir de aqui así que puedo darte super buenos consejos de como disfrutarla.
Professional, aficionada a la natació, la lectura, al cant. M'agrada els esports de natura, viatjar i conèixer nous llocs, altres cultures. M'encantan els gats.

In 2008, I bought a one-way ticket to India and I haven't really been home to Sweden since. In the meantime I have lived and worked in Thailand, Norway, Iceland, the Netherlands, Malaysia, France and Greece.

I work in hospitality and do consulting for various hotels and bars operating throughout Europe. My main passion is for writing though, and as well as working as a freelance journalist, 

I travel whenever I can and have been to over 50 countries in the last 8 years on the road.

I love to get to know my guests too, and I always try to make sure that everybody who stays here is a good match for me and for my home, so be sure to tell me about yourself and your trip when you write to me too : )

I share  an artistic workshop with 3 friends in Gracia, our neighborhood. 
I used to manage bars and restaurants, so I love to host, cook and share good moments!  I traveled a lot and I enjoy the company of open minded people, as I hope to be myself! 
It will be a pleasure to meet you!
Welcome !

host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about: Hello!! I'm an architect from colombia. I like to start new travel experiences in wonderful places, know new friends and the culture.

We're Oasis Collections, we are excited to welcome you to your Home. Please let us know if you need any assistance during your stay, whether you need tickets for an excursion, a stocked fridge or a restaurant reservation, we are more than happy to help!
host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about: Fashion designer / actress with frequent travels especially to LA and NYC, I love animals, my family, live music and the arts, travelling, sunshine, good food and wine.
Barcelona
We are David and Paula a young couple who rent a small and charming individual room for a short stays.
host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about:
I´m an Argentinean girl who lives for 7 years now in Barcelona.
I love to travel, interact with the different ways of living in this world…
I´ve being around the Southeast Asia for 4 months, also 4 months around Argentina and 1 month in India…Gathering  experiences and enriching the soul and eyes!
I am a shaker barmaid, I like very much cooking, drink a tasty wine and enjoy a few drinks with friends.
barcelona lover

I was born in Barcelona, a city that I love. I feel blessed to live in a beautiful sunny and quiet attic, and I am happy to share it with other people. 

I like doing sport, most of all triathlons. 

I manage a bookshop / stationery downtown Barcelona, and if I am not at home when you arrive, my mother Montse will be welcoming you.

I am looking forward to helping you have a good stay in Barcelona. Have a nice day!
host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about: I am a 30 year old woman who has an adventure for life. I lived abroad for 7 years and was deeply touched by the hospitality of the people I met along the way. I love to meet people when I travel even if it is within my own country. I am a psychotherapist and eco therapist amoungst other things. I have a love for nature that drives my passion for life.
No fumador, economista.

host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about: I am a simple, cheerful person.  Excited about life. I like the idea of meeting people and their cultures, their way of life. I love art, to draw, to paint, to create, to invent. About life ... enjoy the day to day, share with friends and family.

Hi it's Ines and Mari ;)
We would be really happy to  host new people in  our home.
We hope we can chared this place in the kindest way!

Hi! I'm organised, prudent and proactive. I'd like to be concious about the details, I have good communicative skills.

I have lots of experience as a guest and host in Airbnb, I've traveled quite a lot. 

I like that people who stay at mine can feel like staying at a friends! Once here you can say you are staying at friend's in Barcelona.

Soy organizada, previsora, además, procuro ser consciente de los detalles, me comunico bien con la gente.

Tengo mucha experiencia como huésped y anfitrión,  me gusta ayudar a que los huéspedes tengan una buena experiencia.
host_neighbourhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot

host_about: Hello! We're Sara&Adri and will be a pleasure to host you :-)

I love travelling and meeting new people. Also I like to host people from all over the world and help them to enjoy Barcelona.
 
As I have another flat in Sitges sometimes I can´t meet my guests personally. I have a small team that helps me to manage the apartment. So during the check in you might meet one of my friends. But if you have any problems or questions I´m always there for you to help.
 
 Do not hesitate to send your request! It will be a pleasure to host you!

Born in Spain, raised in Asia, lived in France, Germany, Canada...I'm guest and host so I appreciate a lot having clean and respectful people around me and I'm very aware of the rules in other homes. A quite, clean and peaceful enviroment is important for me. 

I practice Home Sharing, which means I share my home with travelers interested in staying as responsible citizens, respecting the rules of the house. 

Living in Barcelona is wonderful, the weather is beningn most of the time so you can stay outdoors and enjoy the city. 

I speak English, French, some German and Italian. Plus Catalan and Spanish.

I am very sociable and friendly person, 
I love to travel and meet new people, I like tourism in which we can feel and live much like the locals so I want that the people who visit Barcelona can feel the same.  Barcelona is very special. I work as a full time host in short term rentals in this city and absolutely love what I do because I love to meet people and make them feel as comfortable as at their homes. Go where is common between local residents can make the difference and turn your trip in something to remember. I can give you advice and help you to find and recomend nice places or unforgettable visits in this beautiful city of Barcelona!

Soy una persona muy sociable y amigable,
Me encanta viajar y conocer gente nueva, me gusta el turismo en el que podemos sentir y vivir como los lugareños, así que quiero que las personas que visitan Barcelona sientan lo mismo. Barcelona es muy especial. Trabajo como anfitrión a tiempo completo en alquileres a corto plazo en esta ciudad y amo absolutamente lo que hago porque amo encontrar a la gente y hacerlos sentir tan cómodos como en sus hogares. Ir a donde es común entre los residentes locales puede marcar la diferencia y convertir su viaje en algo para recordar. ¡Puedo darte consejos y ayudarte a encontrar y recomendar buenos lugares o visitas inolvidables en esta hermosa ciudad de Barcelona!
I am a Barcelona local, proud of my city and specially of the area where the apartment is, the Born, where I tend to hang around

Soy una persona alegre y dinamica, en busqueda constante de nuevas experiencias. Adoro el mar, el deporte, mis hijos, viajar y conocer personas de todo el mundo. He viajado mucho por America del Norte, Centra y Sur, gracias a mi anterior trabajo de azafata de vuelo, conozco la mayor parte de capitales europeas y estoy enamorada de una isla que se llama Formentera, donde practico Paddle Surf. Me gusta leer libros de aventuras, estilo Wilbur Smith, suspense como Ken Follet y de crecimiento personal. Acostumbro a ir al cine y soy una aficionada a las peliculas de autor. Me encanta degustar la cocina de otros lugares, y hago inventos en la cocina. Tambien soy una gran amante del vino y a menudo participo en degustaciones. En lo que respecta a musica, me gusta actual como Bruno Mars, Rihanna, Adele, pero sigo escuchando tambien canciones y grupos de mi epoca mas joven, tales como U2, Red Hot Chili Peppers, etc.
Si hay una frase que me define es "Carpe Diem", pues creo que hay que saber disfrutar de cada uno de los momentos que esta vida nos brinda.
Viviendo hace 10 años en Barcelona, me gusta leer, viajar y conocer lugares que no he visitado.

Soy muy sociable. Me encanta salir a comer y a disfrutar el día, y enseñar ese mundo a mi hija.

We are a family that we love to travel and to know new cultures around the world, when moving to live outside of Barcelona for the increase of the family we have our beautiful rustic apartment in the city center, we will see that they are august in the as much as if they were in house for it we will be open to all the needs that they have.
Happy easy going

Hola! 

We have been managing over 30 wonderful apartments in Barcelona for many years, and have hosted guests from all over the world. Our properties are maintained in a perfect condition, most of them have been recently renovated. We offer accommodations in the most popular areas of Barcelona (Gothic Quarter, El Born, Barceloneta, Eixample and Gracia) for a reasonable price. Being into the hospitality for such a long time, we know how to make your stay smooth and comfortable. Our team is always there to answer your questions and help you in case you need anything during your stay. 

We'll be glad to welcome you in Barcelona!

 Me gusta la naturaleza, cocinar, no como carne, me encanta bailar y reír. Me considero una chica alegre y extrovertida, me gusta hospedar gente en mi casa y intercambiar costumbres y pasiones.
Es un placer disponer de una habitación para facilitar a las personas  conocer mejor la bonita ciudad de Barcelona y también sacarme un dinerito.

Hello, we are Carolina and Mike. I am from Buenos Aires and he is from London. 

We live in Barcelona because we love how arty, multicultural and lively it is. A big plus is the weather, 300 plus days of sun a year makes our experience even better! We also enjoy having the beach and the mountain so close as we love being out in nature. 

Mike is a plant-based chef and I am a health coach. We have a nice home that reflects tranquility, harmony and good energy. 

We enjoy cooking healthy tasty meals. Sharing delicious and flavourful plant-based foods is one of our most enjoyable hobbies. "By doing what you love you inspire and awaken the hearts of others" is our motto.

We speak fluent English, Spanish and can understand some Italian and Portuguese :)

We are currently renting a single room in an amazing location. The room is quiet and cozy and would fit perfectly any solo traveller. We like to offer an atmosphere of tranquility and happiness at home, as any kind of tip and help during your stay. 

Looking forward to hear from you soon!

Hoping you have a wonderful stay in this vibrant and amazing city... Welcome! 

Best regards,

Caro and Mike

Hi guys! I'm Barbara, I am from france but i live in Barcelona since one year now with my boyfriend Nils. We really felt in love with Barcelona's vibes. I am a photographer and i do some webdesign, i'm very interested in arts, but I also love music, cinema, travelling all around the world, politics, and so much more. Alquilo una habitacion para una pesona. Es un piso familiar muy tranquillo respectuoso, limpio y  organizado.
En la habitacion tienes una ventana y entra mucha luz.
Tienes una  cama individual y duerme una persona. 
No si permite traer nadie en el piso, ni fiestas.  
En el piso tienes internet wi-fi.
Dentro del piso se puede utilizar la cocina, el baño (Website hidden by Airbnb) ( la cocina y el baño es compartido).
En la cocina puede utilizar: La nevera, cafetera, tostadera y microondas.
Dentro del piso y en todo apartamento NO se puede FUMAR y NO se puede beber ALCOHOL.
El piso es  céntrico. y  el piso queda 10 minutos caminando hasta plaza catalunya y 10 minutos caminando hasta plaza espany (Website hidden by Airbnb) minutos caminando hasta la parada de autobús  AEROBUS este autobus lleva hasta el aeropuerto de BCN. 
Ell piso también queda cerca de la parada de metro urgell L1,  y metro hospital clinico L5 . que lleva hasta la sagrada familia. Para ir a la Playa, abajo del piso tienes la parada del auto bus   que deja en la playa..
hay cerca del piso supermercados, panderia, fruteria, pizzaria, restaurantes etc.

Bienvenidos! Me llamo Leyla, soy argentina pero vivo en Barcelona desde el año 2001. Desde pequeña mi casa ha sido el lugar de encuentro de amigos y familiares, y he heredado lo de ser un buen anfitrión. Me encanta cocinar para mis amigos y mi pasión es la pastelería. Espero que Barcelona te seduzca como a mí, es una ciudad llena de rincones bellísimos, gente amable, buen clima y buena gastronomía. Que disfrutes tu estadía!
Père de famille vie à Barcelone,travaille chez Avis Budget group.

Hi There!
We are Tywa and Lion, 2 guys who traveled the world more than 15 years already and got experiences all over with people and groups of people. We are flexible and easy going and we are very happy to show you the best places of Barcelona from an insider point of view. Lion is a food and travel vlogger and Tywa is local guide of Barcelona with more than 5 years experience. Will be lovely to share our time with you and our knowledges. Welcome in your home.

I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start because of its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Coolrooms and couldn’t think of a better job: at Coolrooms we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Coolrooms, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

Hello! I am Dana and I from a small town in Romania:Râmnicu Valcea. I lived in four countries until now: Romania, USA, Italy and Spain. I did my master in Italy and now I live in Barcelona, Spain. I am working here in business development. 
As I like to travel, I like also to meet new people and to get to know another cultures. Airbnb helped me to find accommodation while I was travelling, so now I try to help another people, as well.
In my free time I like to walk outside with my friends or to read. I like to see people happy and to give them a good vibe.
Let's share some time together and meanwhile I can teach you some words in Romanian. 
See you soon,
Dana!

I invite you to come to this wonderful city and stay in my  beautiful home. The house is in the centre, Eixample district, only three streets from high-end commercial street Paseo de Gracia. My apartment is 140sqm where I am living alone with two nice very well educated cats. 
Your bedroom is 15sqm and a little balcony that overlooks beautiful modernist buildings.
Your room has one double bed, sofa and warderobe. You can use private separate bathroom with shower. Kitchen with all supplies and two big living rooms are to your service. Building is with consierge and located in a 5 minutes walking distance to Paseo de Gracia.

I am looking forward to host and get to know new travellers and make sure you enjoy my city as much as I enjoy it!

Hope to meet you soon!

Hola!
Desde 2010 LUDERNA le ofrece las mejores casas y apartamentos para sus días de vacaciones en Baqueira y el Valle de Aran, convirtiéndonos en anfitriones de miles de personas que han decidido alojarse con nosotros, soportados en un amplio equipo de personas especializadas en la gestión de alojamientos turísticos.
Todas nuestras casas y apartamentos están gestionados en exclusiva. Verificamos la calidad de nuestros alojamientos personalmente reserva a reserva. Check-in y check-out presencial en el alojamiento. Teléfono de asistencia 24hs. Lencería blanca, con fundas nórdicas, en todos nuestros alojamientos. Nuestras guías y recomendaciones. Nuestros descuentos en las mejores tiendas para el alquiler de material de esqui y en escuelas para vuestras clases en la nieve. Nuestro conserje virtual, etc...
LUDERNA es un proyecto que persigue ofrecer la mejor experiencia a aquellos que disfrutan de una nueva forma de viajar, disfrutando de la intimidad y la vida en familia propios de un apartamento, y de los servicios propios de un hotel que solo LUDERNA puede ofrecerle. 
Queremos convertirnos en sus anfitriones y enseñarle uno de los más espectaculares lugares del mundo, nuestro Valle de Aran.
Bienvenido!

Carpe diem

Hi,

Simpatizo con la filosofia Budista,vegana,ecologista sostenible. La experiencia que ofrezco es solamente un alojamiento agradable fuera del centro.
Normas:
-Dejar en la entrada los zapatos,para evitar suciedad,hay disponibles zapatillas para andar por la casa.
-No se puede cocinar.Solo calentar en horno eléctrico alimentos,pre-cocinados.
-No se puede utilizar lavadora.
-Hay una gata,puede que el olor a animal te disguste,tenlo en cuenta al gacer tu reserva.
Mi cuarto de baño es antiguo pero lo tengo muy limpio.
No hay lujos en la casa.Si quieres decirme cualquier sugeréncia d mejora será bien acogida,mi idea es ir mejorando la estancia de mis huéspedes,gracias a vuesyros comentarios,que siempre van a ser bien recibidos.
-Disponeis de cubiertos ,platos y vasos de uso exclusivo.
-Recordar que compartimos el baño y el w.c,que siempre despues de su uso deberá quedar cerrado,osea la tapa bajada del w.c.
SI PUEDES:
-Comprar y dejarte alimentos en la nevera.Pan,leche,etc.
-Calentar alimentos pre-cocinados en horno electrico.

host_about: Hola soy Enrique de Barcelona, soy una persona creativa, sociable y con buen sentido del humor.

Hi!
We are an expat couple living and loving life in Barcelona. 

We love connecting with people all over the world. We are both passionate about the transformation of the human beings after having overcome our own personal struggles. While Philippe works as Spiritual Guide helping people and entrepreneurs create a positive impact in the world without the stress, hustle and grind, Cristina is Health Coach and Naturopath student helping people heal their bodies both physically and emotionally.

Although I (Philippe) have a Swiss citizenship, I actually grew up in 5 different countries, mostly in Singapore and Paris and have lived in 8 altogether, consequently, I speak 5 languages (English, French, German, Spanish and Portuguese) and feel mostly like a citizen of the world. 

Cristina is originally from Guatemala but holds a Spanish and German citizenship. She's bilingual English/ Spanish.  
 
We are passionate about food & cooking: Philippe's love for food comes from having owned a restaurant and worked in the Hotel Industry while Cristina's joy for cooking came for her search for better ways of clean eating. We enjoy eating out, going for hikes, dancing, reading, biking, and going on travel adventures.
I am a very relaxed guy who likes to have fun. I am Mexican and I have been living in Spain since some years ago.

Hola viajer@s! Entre mis aficiones está la música, la danza contemporánea y el yoga. Me gusta estar en contacto con la naturaleza, me encanta la playa!, disfrutar de eventos culturales (circo, conciertos, performance, etc.). Me deleito con la gastronomía...últimamente asiática. En invierno soy más casera y veo más series que el resto del año. Y me encanta viajar, aunque no tengo la posibilidad de hacerlo tanto como me gustaría ;)

host_about:
I am Kimberly from the United States - North Carollina. I am 29 years old. I graduated from the University of North Carolina at Greensboro with a double major in Dance and Psychology. After graduation, I came to Barcelona to study Spanish, then I got certified to teach English. I have been teaching English since 2011 and in 2017 I started my own company geared towards helping travelers who come to Barcelona with their trips. I help give them information and recommendations and I meet with them in person to show them the local gems of the city. 

During my nearly 7 years here, I have never stopped touring in this city because there is so much to see and do! I am a super nerd for festivals and I'm always going out to enjoy the never-ending list of cultural events going on. I am eager to share my experience with you!

Me gustan mucho los deportes, surf, fútbol,snowboard, kitesurf PING-PONG, actividades culturales en general, salir a escalar disfrutar de la naturaleza y de los amigos. im a laid back guy who likes to meet people from all around the world. I enjoy clubbing, art, music and playing sports of all kinds namely, swimm and snowboarding. Food is also a great passion of mine both eating and cooking :-) I have just bought a flat and happy to let some guests stay.
 My mission: to see, experience and appreciate as much of the world as possible.

I recently moved to Barcelona after 15 years in London. 
Six years ago I moved to East London to the haven of Victoria Park Village and have watched the whole area of Hackney grow and change. Since the olympics, this area has thrived and benefitted from huge investment. Victoria Park had a complete rehaul in 2012, and is now considered as one of the most beautiful green spaces in London.
I love meeting new people and swapping stories and information with them. In my opinion, everyone has something interesting to share. 
I'm a freelance writer and director so spend a lot of time away for my work, which is why I am looking to share my home with fellow travellers.
I'll be available during your stay to share with you local tips and advice, or will leave you to your own devices - whatever suits you best.
We are a young and nice couple, not noisy and clean.
I love traveling and filming

Originally from Uruguay, lived in NYC and French Swiss alps, Barcelona bound since 2015. Beach boy, main reason why I settled in here, foodie and outgoing. There are options when it comes to go out, I can happily recommend places to eat, depending on your tastes, but near my place you have an excellent gourmet South American-Asian fusion cuisine that is to die for (Hawkers), as well as a bakery good for morning cafes and snacks (Molika Café) or a typical Catalan bar with good price value relation of th noon menu. To go out you may visit Apolo, a great venue that can offer different kind of parties or a depending on the day.

My partner Robin and I moved to Barcelona from London in May 2017 and we haven't looked back! This is a beautiful city with loads to offer in fun and culture, not to mention the sun, great beaches, nearby mountains and stunning food. This is our first time hosting so whether you need introducing to the neighbourhood, tips for great sightseeing or just a comfortable bed to spend the night we're looking forward to having you stay in our lovely apartment.

Respecto al Check in, ten presente que es a las 7 pm. Antes es difícil pero coméntemelo! 
El piso es de propiedad, por lo que es parte de mi. Solo te pido que lo cuides.
Saludos!

host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

host_about:
¿Cuáles son esas 5 cosas sin las que no podrías vivir?
Pues la familia, los amigos, la naturaleza (playa, montaña, el aire libre en sí) y la sensacion de libertad que aporta y el deporte. Son cuatro pero con eso ya me valgo!

Cuéntales cómo sería tenerte como huésped o anfitrión: Como anfitrión todavía no me he iniciado, pero no descarto empezar a serlo en el futuro proximo.
Como huesped soy una persona muy limpia y ordenada y suelo cuidar el sitio donde me alojo como si fuera mío, ya que durante mi estancia lo considero mi hogar. Soy una persona bastante respetuosa, amable y muy sociable. Ademas pienso que el hecho de haber viajado mucho y hospedado en varias casa he creado lazos de amistad con los anfitriones que me han recibido, incluso algunos me vienen a visitar de vez en cuando.

What are those 5 things that you could not live without?
Basically family, friends, nature (beach, mountain, outdoors itself) and the feeling of freedom it brings and sport. They are four but already worth it!

Tell them how would you be as a guest or host: As host I have not started yet , but I'm probably starting to be one in the near future.
As a guest I am a very clean and tidy person and I tend to take care of the place where I stay as if it was mine, because during my stay I consider it my home. I am a very respectful, friendly and very sociable person. Also I think that by the fact of having traveled a lot and stayed at places as a guest helped me to create have several friendships with hosts that have received me, some even come to visit me from time to time.
My name is Karina
Young business professional, not a disturbing person , generally talketive and very clean and tidy.

El entorno dinámico y alegre de la capital catalana se plasma en The Moods Catedral en forma de experiencia de alojamiento cercana y cálida. Desde el trato de nuestro personal hasta la comodidad de nuestras estancias o zonas comunes, todos los ambientes del hostal tienen mucho de Barcelona y del carácter mediterráneo de sus gentes.

Una idiosincrasia que se percibe ya a la llegada a este hotel del barrio Gótico, donde una recepción con techo de volta catalana con ladrillos en blanco y muebles de líneas sencillas en tonos beige dan la bienvenida al visitante. El pavimento textil en tonos tierra a juego con el minimalismo del mobiliario se conjuga a la perfección con paredes blancas no exentas de vegetación y una presencia omnipresente de la madera. El toque final de bienestar lo aportan las cómodas butacas en tela de lino, un lugar donde descansar o tomar algo.

Esta decoración de diseño llena de guiños a la tierra se reproduce a lo largo de todos y cada uno de los espacios. Colores puros, elementos básicos y geometrías simples se repiten en la zona común de este hotel situado en el límite de los barrios del Gótic y el Born.

En esta zona común, a la cual nos gusta llamar Helpyourself por el servicio gratuito de bebidas al cual tienes acceso durante todo el día, encontrarás también una sala donde hojear cualquiera de nuestras revistas de moda, tomarte algo, trabajar con tu ordenador o simplemente descansar después de una jornada de turismo en la ciudad.

Asimismo, nuestras 17 luminosas y tranquilas habitaciones han sido creadas en un estilo contemporáneo donde la exclusividad no está reñida con la sencillez.

En The Moods Catedral te transportamos a la mismísima esencia del Mediterráneo.

Somos extrovertidos y sociables pero, como trabajamos durante el día, nos gusta relajarnos al llegar a casa. Estamos muy abiertos a la convivencia pero, si preferís estar tranquilos y "a vuerto aire", dispodréis de un espacio semindependiente con total intimidad. 
Si tenéis cualquier duda o queréis más información, no dudéis en contactar con nosotros. Esperamos veros pronto!

host_about:
Dentro de una de las avenidas más vivas y céntricas de Barcelona, entre edificios modernistas con las firmas de moda más importantes y los restaurantes más exquisitos, se encuentran ubicadas nuestras dos suites de lujo piscina compartida en uno e los edificios más emblemáticos  de la gran capital del mediterraneo, no solo te alojas en uno de los edificios con más historia de Barcelona, sino que estar en la Plaza de Cataluña ¡lo tienes todo a un paso! al lado de los principales monumentos y atracciones turísticas, el aeropuerto está a menos de media hora y tienes dos paradas de metro a 300 metros.
_________________________________________________________

Centrally located on one of the liveliest avenues in Barcelona, tucked away between modernist buildings filled with some of the most iconic fashion labels and exquisite restaurants – here is where you’ll find our exclusive suites to be your starting point to explore the grand capital of the Mediterranean. Discover why:

In the heart of the city. Not only will you be staying at one of the most historical buildings in Barcelona, but because you’re located in the Plaza de Cataluña, you are just a stone’s throw from everything! You’re right next to the main monuments and tourist attractions. The airport is also less than half an hour away and there are two metro stops just 300 metres away.

Gracias por visitar mi perfil y ojalá nos veamos pronto!

I hope you feel at home at my place!

host_about:
Mahmoud Alhawajri is a Palestinian, born and raised in Saudi Arabia. In 2008, he graduated from Palestine College of Nursing,in Palestine.

He was enrolled in various courses on humanitarian project management and coordination over a period of 6 years. He recently received a diploma certificate in Human Rights and International Law. He is currently studying for a master degree in Peace Culture at the University of Barcelona. At the same time, he is working as humanitarian projects technician with Creart Association to implement projects in Palestine.

Alhawajri has been working on various projects in Palestine with the coordination of Spanish international organizations. Such projects included sexual and reproductive rights of women in Palestine, Lebanon and Jordan, basic health care, maternal & child health, reproductive health in Gaza, Emergency Healthcare in Gaza, Urgent Improvement of socio-economic conditions and food security in Gaza. Recent projects involve the promotion of education of Peace-building, gender equity and equality and the rights of children.

Somos Cris y Nuria, dos amigas que  inspiradas en nuestros viajes, abrimos Itaca Hostel en Agosto de 2001 con la intención de reunir lo que más nos gustó de los sitios que fuimos conociendo alrededor del mundo.

Conseguimos transformar unas antiguas oficinas de un edificio muy céntrico en un albergue cómodo, agradable, alegre y tranquilo; pensado para todos los viajeros: mochileros, parejas, familias, etc. Un lugar donde poder descubrir la ciudad y la cultura a tu propio ritmo.

We are a recently married couple and have lived in beautiful Barcelona for 10 years now. I'm Catalan and my husband is a cocktail of a few nationalities, but we speak English together.

We enjoy cooking at home, as well as eating out. We love our Japanese and steak restaurants and we can never say no to a crepe, there's a good place close by. :-)

We both work in tech-related start-ups, and relax by going for walks around the city and "netflix and chill" in front of the tv in the evenings. 

As hosts, we strive to always be hospitable and love to focus on the small details to make everyone feel welcome. We have a good knowledge of our surroundings and of the city and like to make sure that all guests get the most out of their experience in this city we both love.

We are Anna, Camille, Susana and Gianni. We love traveling and meeting people from other countries. We work together every day to make sure you enjoy this great and beautiful city. We would love to host you. We will receive you with a big smile and offer you our best.

We can offer you our apartments all over Barcelona. Feel free to choose amongst some of the best neighborhoods in the city. 

Let us inform you about all you can do in the city, restaurants, bars, nightclubs and so much more. 

We can't wait to meet you!! :)

Also you can see all our apartments in our website 
APBCN Apartments

Hola!
 Mi gran pasión es viajar y conocer el mundo, lo que me ha llevado a vivir en distintos países y conocer otras culturas.
 Amo Barcelona pero estoy prácticamente todo el tiempo fuera por viajes, así que he decidido compartir mi bello apartamento con todos. Pero no os preocupéis, estaréis muy bien atendidos ya que mis amigos me ayudan a cuidar a mis huéspedes cuando no estoy en la ciudad.
 Me encanta viajar y todo tipo de viajes, de ocio y descanso, de turismo, de aventura, a grandes ciudades, pequeños pueblos o lugares salvajes, con familia, amigos o incluso solo. Disfruto mucho conociendo la gente de otros países y aprendiendo de sus culturas.
 He utilizado Airbnb para viajar en numerosas ocasiones y ahora me he decidido a ser anfitrión. Me gusta ofrecer un buen servicio, que la gente quede encantada de la experiencia y que disfruten en la vivienda, del barrio y de la ciudad en la que he vivido gran parte de mi vida y de la que estaré encantado de compartir sus mejores secretos.
 Os invito a disfrutar de la estancia!
 
 *** 
 
 Hi !
 I travel a lot - for work and - the best part - also for pleasure. I love meeting new people, tasting new food, experiencing new cultures. I have lived in different countries and continents so traveling is very much part of my DNA as well as my life experience. I have used Airbnb in the past and I am now happy to host fellow travelers.
 I live in Barcelona but I spend most of my time traveling so I have decided to share my beautiful apartment with you.
 But don't worry, you will be well taken care of when I am not in town thanks to my friends, who are there to help my guests with anything they need. On my side, I will be more than happy to share with you the Madrid I love - its main landmarks but also its fantastic restaurants, bright squares, and bustling bars.
 Enjoy your stay!

I´m Brazilian, 39 years old. I live in Barcelona now. I would be happy to accommodate you and make your stay comfortable and easier. 
LOCATION: 
My flat is in the best neighborhood in the city, a walking distance from the Center of the city 2 minutes walking from the metro station, besides a big supermarket, in front of a bakery, in a neighborhood that has everything you need. Supermarkets, drug stores, restaurant, and whatever you need is only a few steps away from my apartment, 
As you can see from the map, my flat is located in one of the most famous and central squares in Barcelona with plenty of drugstores, boutiques, markets, supermarkets, bars,  restaurants, and cafè. 
My apartment is equipped and I will provide you with all the comforts to make your stay a comfortable one and I will give you plenty advice on how to discover Barcelonal.

You can check in any time, you’ll just need to let me know your check in time a couple of days in advance If you need, you can leave your baggage in my place and pick them up anytime 
Contact me and I will give you all the information you need. 
I´m a Portuguese teacher, so if you need or want to learn some Portuguese, tell me and I will send you the course program.

Please, do not ask for a reservation if you don´t have enough information about your profile like photos, profession, age, etc...

Old City Charm / Medieval Architecture / Romantic / Nightlife / Home to La Rambla / Shopping / Museums & Art Galleries / Cultural Sites / Convenient Central Location / Traditional Tapas / Restaurants and Cool Bars

Perfect for: 
As the most central point of the city – this is where you’ll find the iconic Plaça de Cataluña and boulevard of La Rambla de Cataluña  
Anyone who wants to stay right in the heart of the city – it’s all here! Couples will enjoy the romantic squares and abundance of cultural sites. You will love its central and convenient location. If shopping is at the top of your to-do list then you’ll be enchanted by the never-ending streets of both high-end fashion stores and small boutiques.

About the Gothic Quarter: 
The oldest neighborhood in Barcelona, the Gothic Quarter dates all the way back to the Roman Empire and is unquestionably the city’s cultural and physical heart. It’s overflowing with medieval remnants, Baroque churches and Gothic cathedrals and it feels like travelling through time as you stroll the ancient labyrinthine streets.

If you’re only staying in Barcelona for a weekend or a few days, staying in Gótico is a good idea as it will enable you to do and see more.

Soy una argentina, mama de tres, viviendo en Barcelona, ciudad que amo con el corazón! Adoro recibir personas de alrededor del mundo en casa y hospedarme  en casas particulares de Airbnb. Me encanta llegar a casa y encontrar a un huésped cocinando, por ejemplo! Me gusta compartir mis cosas y charlas! Cuando alguien se queda en casa es como si fuera de la familia, a pesar de ser generalmente estadías muy cortas, nuestros invitados son como alguien mas de la casa, estamos pendientes si necesita algo o tiene algún inconveniente. Y hemos tenido una suerte enorme de toparnos con los mejores huéspedes del mundo! Hermosas personas que han entendido que cuando vienen a casa, llegan a un hogar que es tanto suyo como nuestro por lo que son respetuosos con las cosas materiales como con las personas que conviven en el. Hemos sido muy afortunados y queremos seguir ofreciendo a las personas un "hogar" en Barcelona!

Hello,
My name is Maria, I am admin of several rooms in Barcelona.

Moisés Gordo Gómez conocido como Moe en el mundo de la cultura Hiphop cultivándose de forma autodidacta en la danza del Bboying (BreakDance) desde el año 2003. Formándose desde 2009 en Danza Contemporánea, con conocimientos básicos de otros bailes como New Style, House Dance, Popping, Locking UpRocking, Lindy hop, Salsa, Samba, Jazz Funk, Ballet y Afrocaribeño . Coreógrafo y director de varias compañías de danza, sin contar numerosos espectáculos o shows, cabe destacar la cia "Break Da Clave" de Salamanca la cual fusionan los bailes Latinos con los bailes Urbanos y la cia "Iron Skulls" que desarrollan actualmente una pieza dónde predominan los bailes Hiphop de una forma experimental y post-apocalíptica. Pertenece al conocido grupo Public Chaos de Cáceres y al respetado internacionalmente Supersouthnics Crew de Madrid fundado en 1995 con los cuales a parte de influenciarse y convivir con ellos ha actuado o participado en diferentes concursos o competiciones a nivel internacional, asistiendo como invitados al evento y/o obteniendo un buen palmaré. Coordina varias asociaciones juveniles de arte urbano entre ellas Asoc. Juvenil BreakDance Plasencia (Cáceres) y Asoc. Juvenil Breakdance Salamanca a través de las cuales imparte cursos completos y talleres por todo el mundo, organiza festivales de ámbito Hiphop a nivel nacional e internacional, recientemente coordina un proyecto subvencionado por Obra Social La Caixa para Cáritas Diocesana Salamanca el cual ha tenido mucha repercusión y por último junto con Gustavo Hoyos "Kaos", compañero de su crew, están terminando el video documental "Desde las Raíces" donde relatan la Historia del BreakDance Español. Ha convivido durante meses con auténticos pioneros del Breakin (Breakdance) y Uprocking (Rock Dance) en la ciudad de New York desde el año 2007, madurando como bailarín y sobretodo como persona. Ha trabajado para Canal Historia (History Channel) en el documental “HOW BRUCEE LEE CHANGE THE WORLD” en New York y ha aparecido en varios medios de comunicación a nivel regional y nacional por sus emprendedores proyectos. Es uno de los creadores, administradores y entrevistadores de la web (Website hidden by Airbnb) portal de foros, información y material multimedia más importante en lo que a Bboying(Breakdance) se refiere en habla Hispana en el mundo entero. Con más de 7000 usuarios registrados y cientos de visitas diarias. Con esta web dirige el grupo de baile UniversoBboy Team , compuesto por los mejores bailarines de la escena actual Española, el cuál asistirá a gastos pagos a unas de las competiciones más conocidas a nivel mundial como es Battle Chelles Pro en París.

host_about: Hola !

In between travels I have been working in London, Barcelona, and Melbourne. In Australia I have also been a volunteer for the rainforest protection movement and for WWOOF. Today I work for the gardens and lands department of Zurich helping the employees with their IT issues. When I travel I am missing Bürli bread and chocolate yoghourt. I am married to Elisangela who is from rural Brasil. She works cooking lunch for a lot of school children and she is also verger of an old pretty church in Zurich. Elisangela misses her home land and calls her parents every day. 

I have read about Airbnb businesses who are already more like a hotels because they are listing so many accommodations, and I counted I am also listing 10 accommodations. One of then is an old couple who have a cute cottage in their garden. We always like to meet them. What I get from Airbnb I entirely pass to them and they give me from the delicious eggs of their chicken sometimes. Two rooms that I am listing are from a friend whose house was too empty after his wife died. Now the house is much livelier and he also seems much happier again. He thinks I should get something for making those contacts, even if I never expected it. Three listings are actually only one holiday house that we own, but during the Film Festival in Locarno I only rent two rooms and I make breakfast because then we always have very good conversations under the kaki tree. Our own accommodations are not so perfect and therefore I try to describe them very well, hoping that sophisticated people won't even consider staying with us. 

Airbnb says it is not a hotel, but I always get messages trying to encourage me for instant booking. I think that instant booking should be something exclusively for hotels. If people do not have a meaningful profile or if they won't tell anything about themselves then I might not even answer their requests.

Hello Dear guests, Im Nina and I live in Barcelona where I manage the apt here but I also have a Riad in Fes which I manage with my business partner and we make sure you are well looked after as we run the guesthouse.

My aim is to make your stay in both countries fantastic, ensuring you enjoy your holiday to the max.

My philosophy is affordable luxury accommodation and I want you to feel you’re staying in exquisite surroundings where no corners are cut without feeling the pinch to your wallets.

We have run the Riad in Fes for 7 years now. Between us all we speak 8 languages and can help you get the best from your stay. Be it being on the vip lists at the top clubs in the new town, get into an undercover sheisha bar, find a drink even in Ramadan, ride a donkey around the Medina or get a good deal on an awesome camel trek. The apartments in Barcelona are just for yourselves but the Riad in Fes is a hostal which in the Summer months is lively and fun and the place to meet other travelers, out of season it is more chilled out but it is still atmospheric and a place to party if you wish, as Morocco is pretty limited to say the least. Not suitable for shy retiring types who want silence! However you can hire the Riad for exclusive use however and this is a popular option for groups or family and friends.

My name is Melissa Elisabeth and after years of traveling the world myself I have opened up my beautiful apartment in lively Barcelona to receive other world travelers in Levi House. My home and the room itself have undergone some changes in its decor and styling so I will make sure to post new pictures. I am a lover of people, animals, nature, good food and even better company. Life can only be lived once and it is our duty to make the best out of it, even when hard times come. Each day is a gift! In my home both the furniture and the love for and of the people make up the ambience. There are no strangers in this world, only friends that we have not met yet. The apartment has a nice set up and natural lighting in each room and at nighttime all the areas have soft lighting which together with the candles creates a romantic atmosphere. Food is also an important factor in this home so if you are a person who loves food please feel free to ask us to join for a meal. Mi casa es su casa, so please feel welcome to come stay with me and Bo at Casa Leiva. We will take good care of you to make your stay in Barcelona an unforgettable one!
